guild.description:
Here we go again...

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/post/66iv/ee_ubwXLfNg)

*Cabal*: n. the contrived schemes of a group of persons secretly united in a plot - also: a group engaged in such schemes.

*Powermod*: n. [short for power moderator] a person of power, usually a moderator on a structured website, that takes too many unpopulist stances

This guild is dedicated to whistleblowing and preventing powermods and the forming of a powermod oligarchy which would censor opinions and lead Ruqqus into the same corruption that is killing Reddit.

body:
The three most common reasons I've heard people have kids are:

* To fulfill biological impulse

* To get help (basically slave labor; not as common in developed countries)

* To rise in social status

Given that the chances of the good outweighing the bad in any given person's life will be quite low, this is basically making another poor soul be born into this world just to get these little perks.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body:
The reason they do is because women are sexually selective, and they know most men badly want pussy, so they will use this to manipulate them. Even good people will do this because no one ever taught them it's wrong. The other, probably even bigger reason is because of the Women Are Wonderful Effect. This is the phenomenon where both sexes instinctively care about females but not males. The reason for this is simple: you only need one male to impregnate thousands of females and have a lot of babies. But thousands of males and one female can still only produce one (or a few) babies.

Most people support this because humans have a fetish for it deeply ingrained into their DNA. But in reality it doesn't work out too well and results in simping and failed marriages motivated by sexual desire, and it's very annoying and unfair to people who are asexual or deviate from gender norms. If the exact same person were born the opposite sex, they'd get exponentially more or less sympathy and help from others simply because of that, not because of anything they did or didn't do to deserve it.

Even good people will do this because no one ever taught them it's wrong. The other, probably even bigger reason is because of the Women Are Wonderful Effect. This is the phenomenon where both sexes instinctively care about females but not males. The reason for this is simple: you only need one male to impregnate thousands of females and have a lot of babies. But thousands of males and one female can still only produce one (or a few) babies.

Most people support this because humans have a fetish for it deeply ingrained into their DNA. But in reality it doesn't work out too well and results in simping and failed marriages motivated by sexual desire, and it's very annoying and unfair to people who are asexual or deviate from gender norms. If the exact same person were born the opposite sex, they'd get exponentially more or less sympathy and help from others simply because of that, not because of anything they did or didn't do to deserve it.

body:
At some point scribes replaced the Isaiah quotation with the LXX version. Here is the Greek which seems to underlie all 3 of them:

> ÎºÎ±á½¶ ÎºÎ·ÏÏÏƒÏƒÏ‰Î½ á¼Î½ Ï„á¿‡ á¼ÏÎ®Î¼á¿³ Î»Î­Î³Ï‰Î½ Î¼ÎµÏ„Î±Î½Î¿Îµá¿–Ï„Îµ á¼¤Î³Î³Î¹ÎºÎµÎ½ Î³á½°Ï á¼¡ Î²Î±ÏƒÎ¹Î»ÎµÎ¯Î± Ï„á¿¶Î½ Î¿á½ÏÎ±Î½á¿¶Î½ ÎºÎ±Î¸á½¼Ï‚ Î³Î­Î³ÏÎ±Ï€Ï„Î±Î¹ á¼Î½ Î²Î¯Î²Î»á¿³ Î»ÏŒÎ³Ï‰Î½ á¼©ÏƒÎ±ÎÎ¿Ï… Ï„Î¿á¿¦ Ï€ÏÎ¿Ï†Î®Ï„Î¿Ï… Ï†Ï‰Î½á½´ Î²Î¿á¿¶Î½Ï„Î¿Ï‚ á¼Î½ Ï„á¿‡ á¼ÏÎ®Î¼á¿³ á¼‘Ï„Î¿Î¹Î¼Î¬ÏƒÎ±Ï„Îµ Ï„á½´Î½ á½Î´á½¸Î½ ÎšÏ…ÏÎ¯Î¿Ï… Îµá½Î¸ÎµÎ¯Î±Ï‚ Ï€Î¿Î¹Îµá¿–Ï„Îµ Ï„á½°Ï‚ Ï„ÏÎ¯Î²Î¿Ï…Ï‚ Î±á½Ï„Î¿á¿¦

> And [John] was proclaiming in the desert...as it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet, "The voice of one crying in the desert..."

However based on the wording you can tell this was a translation from a semitic language, probably Hebrew as Aramaic doesn't fit quite as well here. If we go back to that we get:

> **×•Ö°×™Ö´×§Ö°×¨Ö¸×** ×‘Ö¼Ö·×Ö´Ö¼×“Ö°×‘Ö¸Ö¼×¨ ×œÖµ××Ö¹×¨ ×©××•Ö¼×‘×•Ö¼ ×›Ö´Ö¼×™Ö¾×§Ö¸×¨Ö¹×•×‘ ×Ö·×œÖ°×›×•Ö¼×ª ×”Ö·×©Ö¸Ö¼××Ö·×™Ö´× ×›Ö·×›Ö¸Ö¼×ªÖ£×•Ö¼×‘ ×‘Ö¼Ö·×¡ÖµÖ¼×¤Ö¶×¨ ×“Ö´Ö¼×‘Ö°×¨Öµ×™ ×™Ö°×©Ö·××¢Ö°×™Ö¸×”×•Ö¼ ×”Ö·× Ö¸Ö¼×‘Ö´×™× ×§Ö¹Ö£×•×œ **×§Ö¹×•×¨ÖµÖ”×** ×‘Ö·Ö¼×Ö´Ö¼×“Ö°×‘Ö¸Ö¼Ö•×¨ ×¤Ö·Ö¼× Ö¼Ö–×•Ö¼ ×“Ö¶Ö¼Ö£×¨Ö¶×šÖ° ×™Ö°×”×•Ö¸Ö‘×” ×™Ö·×©Ö°Ö¼××¨×•Ö¼Ö™ ×‘Ö¸Ö¼×¢Ö²×¨Ö¸×‘Ö¸Ö”×” ×Ö°×¡Ö´×œÖ¸Ö¼Ö–×” ×œÖµ××œÖ¹×”ÖµÖ½×™× ×•Ö¼

Which is slightly different:

> And [John] was **proclaiming** in the desert...as it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet, "The voice of one **proclaiming** in the desert..."

As you can see, the "correction" using the LXX introduces a different rendering of ×§×¨×, spoiling the parallel intended by the original author. This error has made its way into all 3 of the gospels which cover this story.
body_html:
At some point scribes replaced the Isaiah quotation with the LXX version. Here is the Greek which seems to underlie all 3 of them:

ÎºÎ±á½¶ ÎºÎ·ÏÏÏƒÏƒÏ‰Î½ á¼Î½ Ï„á¿‡ á¼ÏÎ®Î¼á¿³ Î»Î­Î³Ï‰Î½ Î¼ÎµÏ„Î±Î½Î¿Îµá¿–Ï„Îµ á¼¤Î³Î³Î¹ÎºÎµÎ½ Î³á½°Ï á¼¡ Î²Î±ÏƒÎ¹Î»ÎµÎ¯Î± Ï„á¿¶Î½ Î¿á½ÏÎ±Î½á¿¶Î½ ÎºÎ±Î¸á½¼Ï‚ Î³Î­Î³ÏÎ±Ï€Ï„Î±Î¹ á¼Î½ Î²Î¯Î²Î»á¿³ Î»ÏŒÎ³Ï‰Î½ á¼©ÏƒÎ±ÎÎ¿Ï… Ï„Î¿á¿¦ Ï€ÏÎ¿Ï†Î®Ï„Î¿Ï… Ï†Ï‰Î½á½´ Î²Î¿á¿¶Î½Ï„Î¿Ï‚ á¼Î½ Ï„á¿‡ á¼ÏÎ®Î¼á¿³ á¼‘Ï„Î¿Î¹Î¼Î¬ÏƒÎ±Ï„Îµ Ï„á½´Î½ á½Î´á½¸Î½ ÎšÏ…ÏÎ¯Î¿Ï… Îµá½Î¸ÎµÎ¯Î±Ï‚ Ï€Î¿Î¹Îµá¿–Ï„Îµ Ï„á½°Ï‚ Ï„ÏÎ¯Î²Î¿Ï…Ï‚ Î±á½Ï„Î¿á¿¦

And [John] was proclaiming in the desert...as it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet, "The voice of one crying in the desert..."

However based on the wording you can tell this was a translation from a semitic language, probably Hebrew as Aramaic doesn't fit quite as well here. If we go back to that we get:

×•Ö°×™Ö´×§Ö°×¨Ö¸× ×‘Ö¼Ö·×Ö´Ö¼×“Ö°×‘Ö¸Ö¼×¨ ×œÖµ××Ö¹×¨ ×©××•Ö¼×‘×•Ö¼ ×›Ö´Ö¼×™Ö¾×§Ö¸×¨Ö¹×•×‘ ×Ö·×œÖ°×›×•Ö¼×ª ×”Ö·×©Ö¸Ö¼××Ö·×™Ö´× ×›Ö·×›Ö¸Ö¼×ªÖ£×•Ö¼×‘ ×‘Ö¼Ö·×¡ÖµÖ¼×¤Ö¶×¨ ×“Ö´Ö¼×‘Ö°×¨Öµ×™ ×™Ö°×©Ö·××¢Ö°×™Ö¸×”×•Ö¼ ×”Ö·× Ö¸Ö¼×‘Ö´×™× ×§Ö¹Ö£×•×œ ×§Ö¹×•×¨ÖµÖ”× ×‘Ö·Ö¼×Ö´Ö¼×“Ö°×‘Ö¸Ö¼Ö•×¨ ×¤Ö·Ö¼× Ö¼Ö–×•Ö¼ ×“Ö¶Ö¼Ö£×¨Ö¶×šÖ° ×™Ö°×”×•Ö¸Ö‘×” ×™Ö·×©Ö°Ö¼××¨×•Ö¼Ö™ ×‘Ö¸Ö¼×¢Ö²×¨Ö¸×‘Ö¸Ö”×” ×Ö°×¡Ö´×œÖ¸Ö¼Ö–×” ×œÖµ××œÖ¹×”ÖµÖ½×™× ×•Ö¼

Which is slightly different:

And [John] was proclaiming in the desert...as it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet, "The voice of one proclaiming in the desert..."

As you can see, the "correction" using the LXX introduces a different rendering of ×§×¨×, spoiling the parallel intended by the original author. This error has made its way into all 3 of the gospels which cover this story.

Needless to say this is quite confusing. But it looks to be taken from the Hebrew gospel, which because it is such a common phrase and fits the context here perfectly, almost certainly said:

Now that actually makes sense. And implies that John's following statements are prophetic and not merely his ramblings.

body: You did it first. The religious baker who wanted to be left alone, you just had to attack him and scream in his face and force him to bend to your demands. Maybe, just maybe, they wouldn't associate such negative attributes with gays if you didn't constantly shove it in their face. No, *you* pushed them over the edge, to scorning it and now to wanting to criminalize it. No one hated black people until you who falsely speak for them burned and looted Minneapolis for days straight. Thanks to *you*, now they really are racist, because you made them think this is what black people do. Maybe they wouldn't be so uncomfortable with trans people if it weren't for you fighting mostly for access to the womens' bathroom for people who still have a penis, athletes blatantly cheating by switching to the weaker team, and unbelievable college snowflakes freaking out about because someone dared "assume their gender". And then you pushed it even further, and now you've got them insisting that everyone follow defined gender roles and wanting to repeal the 19th. Maybe they would even be willing to get along you, but you said no, and there's definitely no going back now. Think about it, if a bunch of crazy people are constantly screaming about something relentlessly, you're going to start loathing said thing, even if you otherwise would've loved it. And those crazy people are what you are. Good job, you've managed to turn half the country against everything it once believed in to destroy you and everything you've made them associate with you. But hey, at least you can pull out your precious victim card, which was probably the plan all along!
body_html: You did it first. The religious baker who wanted to be left alone, you just had to attack him and scream in his face and force him to bend to your demands. Maybe, just maybe, they wouldn't associate such negative attributes with gays if you didn't constantly shove it in their face. No, you pushed them over the edge, to scorning it and now to wanting to criminalize it. No one hated black people until you who falsely speak for them burned and looted Minneapolis for days straight. Thanks to you, now they really are racist, because you made them think this is what black people do. Maybe they wouldn't be so uncomfortable with trans people if it weren't for you fighting mostly for access to the womens' bathroom for people who still have a penis, athletes blatantly cheating by switching to the weaker team, and unbelievable college snowflakes freaking out about because someone dared "assume their gender". And then you pushed it even further, and now you've got them insisting that everyone follow defined gender roles and wanting to repeal the 19th. Maybe they would even be willing to get along you, but you said no, and there's definitely no going back now. Think about it, if a bunch of crazy people are constantly screaming about something relentlessly, you're going to start loathing said thing, even if you otherwise would've loved it. And those crazy people are what you are. Good job, you've managed to turn half the country against everything it once believed in to destroy you and everything you've made them associate with you. But hey, at least you can pull out your precious victim card, which was probably the plan all along!

guild.description:
Welcome to Discord...

...where child grooming runs rampant, ideological indoctrination starts young, censorship is a daily occurrence, and where everything you type is monitored by multiple agencies, contractors, and staff.

You didn't realize this when you invited your friends here, but now you have, and it's time to ditch Discord and choose a privacy-friendly alternative for both you, and your friends' privacy.

This guild's purpose is to serve as the town square where we can talk all things Discord.

Invite your Discord friends to this guild, +Discord, so that they may know more about the product.

FYI, submissions into this guild do not need to follow the Discord Terms of Service.

Laughing at the absurdity of society one post at a time. All political sides of the spectrum are welcome. Welcome to PoliticalHumor.
_____

#### Rules

_____

###### POSTS MUST BE BOTH DIRECTLY POLITICAL AND HUMOROUS

Funny content that is NOT political belong here:

* +Memes
* +DankMemes
* +DarkHumorAndMemes (NSFW)

Political posts that are NOT humorous belong here:

* +News
* +OpposingViewpoints
* +Politics
* +World_Politics

If you are looking for ONLY political memes, go here:

* +PoliticalMemes

_____

###### MARK NSFW FOR

* Antisemitism
* Racism

_____

###### NO HARASSMENT OR THREATS OF VIOLENCE

* Do not harass your fellow users.
* Do not threaten with violence or plan to execute unlawful violent activity and do not encourage others to do so.

_____

###### NO SPAM

* Do not flood this guild with rule-breaking or off-topic content.

_____

###### If you encounter rule-breaking content, report and downvote it. For a more accurate rule guide, see the pinned Guide to Posting.

body:
This past year has seen a HUGE uptick in alt-rightists calling themselves conservatives, while simultaneously supporting everything leftist only with the guise of "traditional values" instead of "progressive values". They are advocating for a very strong central government with huge amounts of control over the economy and personal life, basically the antithesis to conservatives before. Then libertarians are no longer their friends and now considered "degenerates". Now the original conservatives are being called "degenerates" and rejected. A few of them are even starting espouse white supremacy, the same as Democrats like Joe Biden until a few years ago! They do not approve of Trump because they think he's not authoritarian enough; and before it was usually feared that Trump was *too* authoritarian. These people are becoming exactly the leftist's strawman of a rightwinger, and something tells me this is not a coincidence. I believe there is a controlled opposition being led by deep state and media elites, to both make conservatives look bad and make sure the government has power no matter who gets elected. Remember Vladmir Lenin said: "The best way to control the opposition is to lead it ourselves."

Even worse, since most people are sheep loyalists to their tribe a lot of former conservatives have followed suit. It's amazing how far you can manipulate people with social engineering.

Edit: [here](https://politicalcompass.org/crowdchart2?spots=-2%7C6%7CDemoncraps,1%7C6%7CCuntservatives%20Now,4%7C0%7CConservatives%20Then) is a rough illustration of the problem.
body_html:
This past year has seen a HUGE uptick in alt-rightists calling themselves conservatives, while simultaneously supporting everything leftist only with the guise of "traditional values" instead of "progressive values". They are advocating for a very strong central government with huge amounts of control over the economy and personal life, basically the antithesis to conservatives before. Then libertarians are no longer their friends and now considered "degenerates". Now the original conservatives are being called "degenerates" and rejected. A few of them are even starting espouse white supremacy, the same as Democrats like Joe Biden until a few years ago! They do not approve of Trump because they think he's not authoritarian enough; and before it was usually feared that Trump was too authoritarian. These people are becoming exactly the leftist's strawman of a rightwinger, and something tells me this is not a coincidence. I believe there is a controlled opposition being led by deep state and media elites, to both make conservatives look bad and make sure the government has power no matter who gets elected. Remember Vladmir Lenin said: "The best way to control the opposition is to lead it ourselves."

Even worse, since most people are sheep loyalists to their tribe a lot of former conservatives have followed suit. It's amazing how far you can manipulate people with social engineering.

Edit: here is a rough illustration of the problem.

body:
**Chapter 11**

> 2 **Now I commend you since you have remembered everything of me and are observing the teachings** as I gave them to you.
> 
> 3 Now I want you to know that the head of every man is the Anointed, but the head of woman is man, 4-16 blah blah blah, no long hair on men despite the rest of the bible and no short hair on women, women are pieces of flesh made solely for sex, etc.
> 
> 17 **But I do not commend you on these instructions**, and because of them you meet together for the worse and not the better. First, although you are indeed meeting as an congregation, I hear that there are divisions among you...

17 and onwards only makes sense following immediately after 2, and 3-16 interrupt sharply interrupt. 3-16 has also been said to not match Paul's writing style.

**Chapter 14**

> prophesying stuff...31 **You can prophesy one by one so everyone will learn and be called [and the spirits of prophets are obedient to prophets]**, 32 for God is not of disorder but of peace, 33 as in all the congregations of the holy.
> 
> 34 The women in the congregations are to shut up, for it is not allowed to them to speak, but to be subordinate as the law also says. 35 And if they want to learn something they are to ask their own husbands at home, for it is shameful for a woman to speak in a congregation.
> 
> 36 Or has the word of God come from you? Or has it only come to you? 37 **If anyone thinks they are a prophet or spiritual**, be aware that what I write to you is the commandments of Master.

Yet again, why does a completely unrelated topic come up smack in the middle of another one, without even any transition whatsoever? And notice how "Paul" in verse 34 appeals directly to "the law" for his argument, which he has spent the entire rest of his epistles *discounting*. Plus, there is no known Jewish law for this; it was a law of the Roman Empire.
body_html:
Chapter 11

2 Now I commend you since you have remembered everything of me and are observing the teachings as I gave them to you.

3 Now I want you to know that the head of every man is the Anointed, but the head of woman is man, 4-16 blah blah blah, no long hair on men despite the rest of the bible and no short hair on women, women are pieces of flesh made solely for sex, etc.

17 But I do not commend you on these instructions, and because of them you meet together for the worse and not the better. First, although you are indeed meeting as an congregation, I hear that there are divisions among you...

17 and onwards only makes sense following immediately after 2, and 3-16 interrupt sharply interrupt. 3-16 has also been said to not match Paul's writing style.

Chapter 14

prophesying stuff...31 You can prophesy one by one so everyone will learn and be called [and the spirits of prophets are obedient to prophets], 32 for God is not of disorder but of peace, 33 as in all the congregations of the holy.

34 The women in the congregations are to shut up, for it is not allowed to them to speak, but to be subordinate as the law also says. 35 And if they want to learn something they are to ask their own husbands at home, for it is shameful for a woman to speak in a congregation.

36 Or has the word of God come from you? Or has it only come to you? 37 If anyone thinks they are a prophet or spiritual, be aware that what I write to you is the commandments of Master.

Yet again, why does a completely unrelated topic come up smack in the middle of another one, without even any transition whatsoever? And notice how "Paul" in verse 34 appeals directly to "the law" for his argument, which he has spent the entire rest of his epistles discounting. Plus, there is no known Jewish law for this; it was a law of the Roman Empire.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God.

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.
guild.name: Christianity

title: Leviticus 18:22
